0.0.1.name: connect20/Shopa_ShareAndEarn
0.0.1.description: Adding shopa and its ‘share & earn’ tools to your retail site allows you to financially incentivize users to recommend your products to their networks and friends.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
